results.title: British High Commission Bandar Seri Begawan

main.title: British High Commission Bandar Seri Begawan

details.description:
Opening hours:
Monday to Thursday, 8.00am to 4.30pm
Friday, 8.00am to 12.00pm
details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

The Foreign and Commonwealth Office and the British High Commission in Brunei are keen to ensure that their buildings and services are fully accessible to disabled members of the public. Wherever possible we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. In these situations we will endeavour to provide a service or access to a building in an alternative way to ensure equality of access for disabled people. To assist disabled visitors, we have set out below details of disabled access at the embassy. We hope this information is helpful.

General Physical Access

If you anticipate requiring assistance, please telephone us in advance of your visit so that we can ensure that we are able to provide access for you (tel: 222 2231 and ask for the Security Manager).

  • Steps & Staircases: all steps and staircases (including fire exits) have at least one set of rails. The main steps have rails on both sides.

  • Lift: a lift is available for access to the British High Commission and British Council on the second floor.

  • Parking: a disabled parking spot is available by arrangement.

  • Floor coverings: floor coverings are safe and even.

  • Handrails: widely available.

  • Doors: if necessary, the security guards can assist in opening doors.

  • Lighting: adequate throughout.

  • Emergency/Evacuation: procedures are in place to assist disabled persons in the event of emergency/evacuation.

  • Telephones: accessible to wheelchair users.

Access for Visually Impaired Visitors

  • Signs: generally clear and easy to read. Floor designation inside the lift is in Braille.

  • Emergency/Evacuation: procedures are in place to assist disabled persons in such circumstances.

Access for Deaf/Hard of Hearing Visitors

  • Microphones: are installed in all Reception areas.

  • Emergency/Evacuation: procedures are in place to assist disabled persons in such circumstances.

2018 Public holidays

The office will be closed on the following days in the calendar year for 2018:

  • Monday 1 January - New Year’s Day

  • Friday 16 February - Chinese New Year

  • Friday 23 February - Brunei National Day

  • Friday 30 March - Good Friday (UK)

  • Wednesday 17 May - First Day of Ramadhan*

  • Thursday 31 May - Royal Brunei Armed Forces Day

  • Friday 15 June - First Day of Hari Raya*

  • Monday 18 June - In lieu of Second Day of Hari Raya*

  • Monday 16 July - In lieu of His Majesty the Sultan’s Birthday on Sunday 15 July

  • Wednesday 22 August - Hari Raya Aidiladha

  • Tuesday 11 September - Islamic New Year

  • Tuesday 20 November - Prophet Muhammad’s Birthday

  • Tuesday 25 December - Christmas Day (UK)

  • Wednesday 26 December - Boxing Day (UK)

Holidays marked * are subject to change

details.description:
For appointments only:
Monday to Friday - 8:30am to 10:30am*
*Except during office holidays

Book your consular appointment [here](https://www.consular-appointments.service.gov.uk/fco/#!/british-high-commission-bandar-seri-begawan/-/service_list).
details.access_and_opening_times:
Making a consular appointment

Our embassies and consulates deal with a large number of urgent cases each year. Before contacting an embassy or consulate with non-urgent enquiries, please read our Support for British nationals abroad: a guide to see if the information you need is there. IIf you still cannot find the information you need, you can contact our Consular team at BSBConsularEnquiries@fco.gov.uk. To make an appointment with the Consular section, please visit our Clickbook Appointment site.

Disabled access

The Foreign and Commonwealth Office and the British High Commission in Brunei are keen to ensure that their buildings and services are fully accessible to disabled members of the public. Wherever possible we have made our buildings and services accessible. Sometimes however, this is not possible due to security or other restrictions. Access for Deaf/Hard of Hearing Visitors

  • Emergency/Evacuation: procedures are in place to assist disabled persons in such circumstances.

2017 Public holidays

The office will be closed on the following days in the calendar year for 2017:

  • Monday 2 January - In lieu of New Year’s Day on Sunday 1 January

  • Monday 30 January - In lieu of Chinese New Year on Saturday 28 January

  • Thursday 23 February - Brunei National Day

  • Friday 14 April - Good Friday (UK)

  • Monday 24 April - Isra’ Dan Mi’raj

  • Monday 29 May - First Day of Ramadhan / Spring Bank Holiday (UK)

  • Monday 12 June - Quran Revelation Day*

  • Monday 26 June - First Day of Hari Raya*

  • Tuesday 27 June - Second Day of Hari Raya*

  • Friday 1 September - Hari Raya Aidiladha

  • Friday 22 September - Islamic New Year

  • Friday 1 December - Prophet Muhammad’s Birthday

  • Monday 25 December - Christmas Day (UK)

  • Tuesday 26 December - Boxing Day (UK)

Holidays marked * are subject to change
